x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: -Checks to make sure the GEOJSON is defined properly and present for every active location and floor space.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Interactive Layer Check

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_7a55f6fd1bb15590ae5b21b5ec4bcb83
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>-Checks to make sure the GEOJSON is defined properly and present for every active location and floor space.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Interactive Layer Check</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation/><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var spaceGR = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_eam_space');
spaceGR.addEncodedQuery('active=true^location_level=location^ORlocation_level=floor');
spaceGR.query();

while (spaceGR.next()){
	var skip = false;
	var layerGR = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_eam_space_layer');
	layerGR.addQuery('space',spaceGR.sys_id);
	layerGR.addActiveQuery();
	layerGR.query();
	if (layerGR.getRowCount() == 0){
		skip = true;
		util.handleOutput('There is no active interactive layer for this space:' + spaceGR.name, 'Warning', 'Space');
	} else if (layerGR.getRowCount() > 1){
		skip = true;
		util.handleOutput('There is more than one active interactive layer for this space:' + spaceGR.name, 'Warning', 'Space');
	}
	layerGR.next();
	if (skip == false){
		var detailGR = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_eam_space_layer_details');
		detailGR.addQuery('space_layer',layerGR.sys_id);
		detailGR.query();
		
		if (detailGR.getRowCount() == 0){
		skip = true;
		util.handleOutput('There is no active layer_data for the interactive layer for space:' + spaceGR.name, 'Warning', 'Space');
	} else if (layerGR.getRowCount() > 1){
		skip = true;
		util.handleOutput('There is more than one active layer_data record for the interactive layer for this space:' + spaceGR.name, 'Warning', 'Space');
	} else {
		var layer_json = detailsGR.layer_data.includes('{"type":"Feature","geometry":{"type":"Polygon","coordinates":');
		if (layer_json == false){
			util.handleOutput('The space layer details record for the following space is missing the geoJson string for the interactive layer:' + spaceGR.name, 'Warning', 'Space');
		}
	}
		
		
	}
	
	
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-08 16:13:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>7a55f6fd1bb15590ae5b21b5ec4bcb83</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Interactive Layer Check</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_7a55f6fd1bb15590ae5b21b5ec4bcb83</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:28</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
